GRP1.Name: PM_CMPLU_STALL_THRD
GRP1.Description: Completion stall due to thread conflict. Group ready to complete but it was another thread's turn.

GRP1.Name: PM_GCT_NOSLOT_CYC
GRP1.Description: Pipeline empty (No itags assigned no GCT slots used).

GRP1.Name: PM_NTCG_ALL_FIN
GRP1.Description: Cycles after all instructions have finished to group completed.

GRP2.Name: PM_CMPLU_STALL_BRU_CRU
GRP2.Description: Completion stall due to Instruction Fetch Unit.

GRP2.Name: PM_CMPLU_STALL_BRU
GRP2.Description: Completion stall due to a Branch Unit.

GRP2.Name: PM_CMPLU_STALL_FXU
GRP2.Description: Completion stall due to Fixed Point Unit.

GRP2.Name: PM_CMPLU_STALL_FXLONG
GRP2.Description: Completion stall due to a long latency fixed point instruction.

GRP2.Name: PM_CMPLU_STALL_SCALAR_LONG
GRP2.Description: Completion stall due to VSU scalar long latency instruction.

GRP2.Name: PM_CMPLU_STALL_SCALAR
GRP2.Description: Completion stall due to VSU scalar instruction.

GRP2.Name: PM_CMPLU_STALL_VSU
GRP2.Description: Completion stall due to VSU instruction.

GRP2.Name: PM_CMPLU_STALL_VECTOR_LONG
GRP2.Description: Completion stall due to VSU vector long instruction.

GRP2.Name: PM_CMPLU_STALL_VECTOR
GRP2.Description: Completion stall due to VSU vector instruction.

GRP2.Name: PM_CMPLU_STALL_NTCG_FLUSH
GRP2.Description: Completion stall due to ntcg flush.

GRP3.Name: PM_CMPLU_STALL_REJ_LMQ_FULL
GRP3.Description: Completion stall due to LSU reject LMQ full.

GRP3.Name: PM_CMPLU_STALL_STORE
GRP3.Description: Completion stall by stores this includes store agen finishes in pipe LS0/LS1 and store data finishes in LS2/LS3.

GRP3.Name: PM_CMPLU_STALL_DMISS_L2L3_CONFLICT
GRP3.Description: Completion stall due to cache miss resolving in core's L2/L3 with a conflict.

GRP3.Name: PM_CMPLU_STALL_DMISS_L2L3
GRP3.Description: Completion stall by Dcache miss which resolved in L2/L3.

GRP3.Name: PM_CMPLU_STALL_DMISS_LMEM
GRP3.Description: Completion stall due to cache miss that resolves in local memory.

GRP3.Name: PM_CMPLU_STALL_DMISS_L21_L31
GRP3.Description: Completion stall by Dcache miss which resolved on chip (excluding local L2/L3).

GRP3.Name: PM_CMPLU_STALL_DMISS_L3MISS
GRP3.Description: Completion stall due to cache miss resolving missed the L3.

GRP3.Name: PM_CMPLU_STALL_DMISS_REMOTE
GRP3.Description: Completion stall by Dcache miss which resolved from remote chip (cache or memory).

GRP3.Name: PM_CMPLU_STALL_ERAT_MISS
GRP3.Description: Completion stall due to LSU reject ERAT miss.

GRP3.Name: PM_CMPLU_STALL_REJECT_LHS
GRP3.Description: Completion stall due to reject (load hit store).

GRP3.Name: PM_CMPLU_STALL_REJECT
GRP3.Description: Completion stall due to LSU reject.

GRP3.Name: PM_CMPLU_STALL_LOAD_FINISH
GRP3.Description: Completion stall due to a Load finish.

GRP3.Name: PM_CMPLU_STALL_ST_FWD
GRP3.Description: Completion stall due to store forward.

GRP4.Name: PM_CMPLU_STALL_THRD
GRP4.Description: Completion stalled due to thread conflict. Group ready to complete but it was another thread's turn.

GRP4.Name: PM_CMPLU_STALL_MEM_ECC_DELAY
GRP4.Description: Completion stall due to mem ECC delay.

GRP4.Name: PM_CMPLU_STALL_FLUSH
GRP4.Description: Completion stall due to flush by own thread.

GRP4.Name: PM_CMPLU_STALL_COQ_FULL
GRP4.Description: Completion stall due to Cast Out Queue full.

GRP5.Name: PM_GCT_NOSLOT_CYC
GRP5.Description: Pipeline empty (No itags assigned no Global Completion Table slots used).

GRP5.Name: PM_GCT_NOSLOT_IC_MISS
GRP5.Description: Global Completion Table empty for this thread due to instruction cache miss.

GRP5.Name: PM_GCT_NOSLOT_IC_L3MISS
GRP5.Description: Global Completion Table empty for this thread due to instruction cache L3 miss.

GRP5.Name: PM_GCT_NOSLOT_DISP_HELD_ISSQ
GRP5.Description: Global Completion Table empty for this thread due to dispatch hold on this thread due to issue queue full.

GRP5.Name: PM_GCT_NOSLOT_BR_MPRED
GRP5.Description: Global Completion Table empty for this thread due to branch mispred.

GRP5.Name: PM_GCT_NOSLOT_DISP_HELD_OTHER
GRP5.Description: Global Completion Table empty for this thread due to dispatch hold on this thread due to sync.

GRP5.Name: PM_GCT_NOSLOT_BR_MPRED_ICMISS
GRP5.Description: Global Completion Table empty for this thread due to instruction cache Miss and branch mispred.

GRP5.Name: PM_GCT_NOSLOT_DISP_HELD_SRQ
GRP5.Description: Global Completion Table empty for this thread due to dispatch hold on this thread due to SRQ full.

GRP5.Name: PM_GCT_NOSLOT_DISP_HELD_MAP
GRP5.Description: Global Completion Table empty for this thread due to dispatch hold on this thread due to Mapper full.
